title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description: Hydraulic liquid spill killed crops bionic food farm.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description: Hydraulic liquid spill killed crops in bionic food farm.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Space worm from Nelron faimily bite the chunk of the hull close
 to power generator and damaged it.

title: Oxygen synthesisor damaged!
description:
Giant insect pierced hull powerful sonic waves
 and damaged Oxygen synthesisator!

title: Fuel cell storage damaged!
description:
Space dinosaur-like crustacians Olk'ok got entagled
 in one of the thrusters with its razor-sharp leg-hair 
 and damaged one of the thrusters.

title: Oxygen synthesisator food farm damaged!
description:
A smooth skin species of space snake got thrugh ventilation
 shaft of oxygen synthesisator.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Lurqoan space fly died and detached it's head and grew new body,
 carrying memories with them. However old carcas of Luruqoan
   hit fuel cell storage and there is major damage.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Space urchin V'ooun with empathic abilities encoutered your ship,
 but despice being pacifistic and empatic it's alergic to red color
   and hit violently your bionic food farm and damagec nearly all crops.

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description:
Carnivorous aliens who have acid for blood got in fight.
 Acid came onboard. Oxygen synthesisator contaminated.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Thruster re-ignitor failed and after some time broke down.
 Fuel is leaking at alarming rate.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
A cat like species of Gattiris pierced power generator
 with it's sharp claws. Fix it quick!

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Space cloud damaged power core
 due to high pitched sonic vibrations.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Va'reax arachnid species tore off one of the
 thrusters with it's giant legs. Major fuel leak! Fix it quickly!

title: Power generator core damaged!
description: Short circuit in power generator core. Power is fading fast.

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description: Static electricity knocked down oxygen synthesisator.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Ancient worm Darois with telepathic abilities teleported to
 bionic food farm and ate most of the crops. Then it teleported out.

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description: Divoc II a race of space bacteria contaminated oxygen production.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Dangerous space worms with infrared vision got attracted with
   heat produced by power generator core
   and made a dent in a hull and damaged power core.

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description:
Sheet like creature with white skin
 clogged the space-air intake. Remove the creature quickly!

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Elo-gex species of electric space bacteria
 somehow got to powercore and damaged it.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Ustreax family of slimy crustacians with powerful
 jaws mistook bionic food farm smell for coffee
   and damaged bionic farm in the process. Fix the damage!

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Nip'Tac brachiopod bit of piece of the ship hull
 and cause fuel leak, because it's thirst for thruster fumes. Am i lucky or what?!

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description:
Giant blackhole nearly sucked spaceship in
 and despite not being even near the center violent shaking of spaceship
   still damaged oxygen pipe system and maybe also other systems.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Asteroid which we nearly avoided still
 scratched hull and kill most of the plants in bionic food farm.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
We colided with ancient tardigrades Zayorin with dark skin
 and damaged one of the thrusters exaust pipe and part of oxygen production.

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description:
Telis monkey-like specis with telescopic vision
 addicted with oxygen damaged oxygen synthesisator while trying to get the fix.
   It also knocked over fuel cell.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Mahua subspecies of space moss somehow found way
 into the spaceship and made new home in your bionic food farm.
   If only it's farts wouldn't create vacuum and kill the plants. Fix it quick!

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Ur'sotus'Lo rodent-like parrot got attracted with 
 it's own reflection from spaceship and damaged power generator in the process.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Subspecies Stiri visually impared species of lizard
 with muscular abdomens and 4 eyelids breached the fuell cell storage.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Sticky changelings who have giant molars.
 Their religion is having full stomach. Bionic food farm scavenged!

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Pij'Ou species of leeches with weak elbows ate all the food
   in bionic food farm, threw up the food and ate it again. It then evaporated.
 Clean up the mess and plant the crops.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Giant moth from Holulu subspecies caused
 solar flare and after-effect is damaged power core.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Hard shell turtle Feregex bit the chunk of the hull of spaceship,
 while trying to impress it's mate during annual mating. Major damage!

title: Oxygen synthesisator damaged!
description:
Floating cyclope got in at least 4 of the oxygen pipes
 with its legs. It still has 23 legs left!
   We should pay attention and fix the pipes.

title: Full cell storage damaged!
description:
Reep'Ar resembling a fish-bird like creature
 with scaled detachable tail got spooked by power generator
 humming and fled instantly leaving tail behind
 and damaging thrusters intake in the process.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description: Acidis cloud got into bionic food farm and damaged the crops.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Hull DAMAGED! Short-sighted See'Gut species
 colided with mothership and damaged powergenerator.

title: Power generator core damaged!
description:
Despite going extinct 127 years ago Odorala fish,
 managed to get electrocuted by powergenerator.

title: Bionic food farm damaged!
description:
Treengi-Kra space-cow manage to destroy all the crops.
 Not sure how I missed the cow in bionic farm but it's expected
   because it never stops growing,
   but I have to fix it now and get rid of space-cow!
